attributes.additional_details: So many little girls and boys look up to the England star wanting to get be the next Beth Mead with her achievements this last year she deserves to be awarded a MBE.
attributes.background: To give the bbc sports personality, 2022 euros winner, Arsenal women’s number 9 a MBE for her resilience thought this last year and for inspiring a nation.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
